title: Fed. Council in Russia power to approve treaties

content.question: In addition to its basic lawmaking function, the Federation Council of the Russian Federation also has the power to

choices.label: approve the president's choice of prime minister
undertake votes of confidence in the government
ratify treaties and approve troop deployments
appoint the chair of the Central Bank

content.answer: ratify treaties and approve troop deployments

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
